skills.name: Cluster Missile
skills.description: Launches homing missiles at multiple targets. Longer charge time. Slightly decreased DMG when hitting the same target multiple times.1st Sequence: 2 missiles.2nd Sequence: 5 missiles.3rd Sequence: 11 missiles.

skills.name: Speedy Retreat
skills.description: [SP: 6][CD: 15s] Accelerates Move Speed of character by 100% for 6.00s.
